item.title: Disable Saitek X.52 pro Clutch Mode
item.description: This post is a memo to self, and describes how to disable the X.52 clutch mode. I am flying with a Saitek/Logitech X.52 pro HOTAS , and this stick has a ‘clutch button’ (labelled “i”) in the thumb position of the throttle (image: clutch highlighed in red) “Clutch mode” for this button means that it is usable as a modfier for the other buttons, when pressed together with a second button.
